title: "About"
---

This is a tutorial site for orderly.

```{r}
#| include: false
packages <- c("orderly", "cli", "fs", "gert", "httr2", "jsonlite", "openssl",
              "rlang", "withr", "yaml")
for (p in packages) {
  loadNamespace(p)
}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Built using `orderly` version `r packageVersion("orderly")`

Rendered on `r Sys.time()` using quarto `r quarto::quarto_version()`

Full system information:

```{r}
sessioninfo::session_info()
```
